title: Over 4k Solana users lost more than $4 million to phishing attacks last month
description:
Phishing scammers have siphoned off over $4 million from Solana wallets in December 2023, according to estimates posted on X by Scam Sniffer, a scams tracker. The attacks affected around 4,000 users, according to the Scam Sniffer. The stolen assets include those robbed by the rainbow attacker through an airdrop phishing attack. The scammers employed […]

The post Over 4k Solana users lost more than $4 million to phishing attacks last month appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Missed Dogecoin's Rise? Explore Cryptos Set to Soar in This Bull Run

title: GameStop confirms plans to shut down NFT marketplace over regulatory concerns
description: GameStop has decided to "wind down" its NFT marketplace due to the "continuing regulatory uncertainty of the crypto space."
